headline: Roper Technologies increases dividend 10% - its 32nd consecutive annual dividend increase
summary: SARASOTA, Fla., Nov. 06, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roper Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROP) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.825 per share, payable on January 17, 2025 to stockholders of record as of January 3, 2025. This represents an increase of 10% over the dividend paid in each quarter of 2024, or an expected $0.30 increase on an annual basis ($0.075 on a quarterly basis).
